title: Murray police investigate apparent double murder-suicide
content:
Police in Murray are investigating what appears to be a double murder and suicide that left two adults and a child dead on Sunday.
Police received reports of a possible shooting at the Vantana Apartments, in the 200 block of E. Vantana Court (6600 South), just before noon Sunday, Murray police spokesman Kenny Bass said.
Officers responding to 911 calls found a man, a woman and a child dead from obvious gunshot wounds inside the residence. Bass could not say what type of gun was used in the shooting or whether the victims had suffered multiple gunshot wounds.
